Contact sidebar pane

Source: R/ui_contactSidebarPane.R
contactSidebarPane.Rd

Constructs a sidebar pane for displaying contact information.

Usage

contactSidebarPane(id)

Arguments

id

character identifier for the sidebar pane.

Value

A shiny.tag object with the sidebar pane.

Details

This is designed to be used as an argument to leaflet.extras2::sidebar_tabs when specifying the user interface for a Shiny web application.

Examples

# \dontrun{
# run Shiny app to demo the sidebar pane
if (interactive()) {
  runExample("allSidebars")
}
# }
